item.title: 'Father of our democracy': Kenya's Raila Odinga dies in India aged 80
item.description: Odinga unsuccessfully ran for the presidency five times but shared power several times.

item.title: Hostage families confirm identities of three of four bodies handed over by Hamas
item.description: Hamas has yet to return 21 hostages' bodies as agreed under a ceasefire deal brokered by the US.

item.title: 'He transformed R&B forever' - Stars pay tribute to D’Angelo, after his death at 51
item.description: The Grammy-winning singer, who died of cancer, "transformed R&B forever", says Beyoncé.

item.title: Bangladesh garment factory fire kills at least 16
item.description: The dead have been burned beyond recognition and officials have warned that the toll could rise.

item.title: Bowen: Trump's role in Gaza ceasefire was decisive, but not a roadmap to peace
item.description: Trump's Middle East visit was a victory lap - but peace does not emerge just because a president decides it.
